text: - My name is Kridsada,
I'm the co-founder and CEO of FlowAccount.

FlowAccount is an easy to
use cloud accounting solution
designed for small business owners.
We're based in Thailand

and we aim to make it easy
for small business owners

who are starting out to
manage their accounting,
payroll, and their back office operations.

Our range of solutions
includes integrations
with local e-commerce platforms,
banks, and payment gateways,

so that small business
owners can easily upgrade

and run their business and
focus on what matters most.
We started with AWS from day one

which allowed us to launch
our startup really quickly.
In addition to that, we're able to scale

to tens of thousands of
customers that we have today

because of AWS's range of
infrastructure and services.
- I'm Wicky, Voravit Takkar,
co-founder and CTO of FlowAccount.
We utilized the service such as EC2

to scale our Windows Stack
quickly and efficiently

in our first year, and we
haven't looked back ever since.

- Most importantly,
AWS allowed us to scale

which enabled us to offer
our products and services

at a very affordable
cost to our customers.

- In Thailand, business
owners always had problems
with affordable and accessible tools
to start their businesses,

and FlowAccount come in with
a web app and a mobile app
at these affordable prices
to help them solve their business needs.

And we can do it because
we're using AWS 100%.
We can slowly scale our system.
We can slowly build it up to their needs.
And today, after seven years,

we have built it up to the
standard of the business owners
and the accountant needs.

So today, these two parties
are working in sync,
running the business efficiently,

and optimizing the business
according to the data
that we provide them.
- We aim to help small business owners
automate and digitize their business.

This enables them to have
the right information

at their fingertips to make
better business decisions.

- If you're a business owner
and you're on the move,

you're running around trying
to make business deals,
and earn some money and do what you like,
FlowAccount come in as a platform

and allow you to work on a
mobile app or on a web app

from anywhere that you
are to open quotations,
to edit them, to update them,
and send the data right into the platform,

where in turn, your accountant
can come check it out
and the communication ends in one goal.
AWS have provided us with the technology
to build an always on system
so that business owners and accountants

can use our platform to run
their business with confidence.
- Through our use of AWS services,

together, we can help
small businesses succeed.
(bright music)
